articles.summary: No team has ever won the Premier League title without having a player in the top 10 goalscorers, but could Arsenal change that?

articles.summary: Nigeria face a huge semi-final against Africa Cup of Nations hosts and favourites Morocco on Wednesday.

articles.title: 'The game has gone' - a bad night for VAR in semi-final

articles.summary: Many Real Madrid fans are in shock at Alvaro Arbeloa's appointment as manager - is it a hasty move or a shrewd decision?

articles.summary: Michael Carrick is appointed as Manchester United's interim manager. Simon Stone assesses if he is the right fit for the job.

articles.title: Rosenior to talk to Sterling and Disasi about Chelsea exile
articles.summary: New Chelsea manager has pledged to speak to Raheem Sterling and Axel Disasi, who were left in limbo by the previous boss.

articles.summary: Watch the best goals from across the FA Cup third-round weekend, including Isaac Buckley-Ricketts' stunner for Macclesfield FC.

articles.title: Gabon's government lifts sanctions on team and Aubameyang
articles.summary: Gabon's government lifts the sanctions it imposed on the national team and striker Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang after their exit from Afcon 2025.

articles.title: Football fan died after being targeted by 'predatory' gambling sites
articles.summary: A coroner concludes that a 36-year-old Liverpool fan took his own life after he was enticed to use illegal gambling websites to bet on football matches.

articles.title: Raducanu fights back in Hobart to win first match since September
articles.summary: Emma Raducanu earned her first victory since September after fighting back to beat Camila Osorio in straight sets in the first round of the Hobart International.
